concept.title: Restarting the appliance
concept.shortdesc: You can restart the appliance either by using the or by using the device restart command on the command line.

conbody.p: Restarting the appliance is not the same as stopping and starting the server. When you restart the appliance, you restart the hardware. When you stop and start the server, you stop and start only the processes that run on the hardware. For more information about stopping and starting the server, see .
When you restart the appliance, the is unavailable. If you are logged in to the when the appliance restarts, you are logged out. The appliance might take several minutes to restart.
